name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
schedule:
1.　　Nature of materials
2.　　Mechanical properties of materials
3.　　Phase diagram & Heat treatments
4.　　Theory of metal cutting
5.　　Machining operations & machine tools
6.　　Cutting tool technology
7.　　Fundamentals of metal forming
8.　　Sheet metal working
9.　　Fundamentals of casting
10.　　Midterm Exam
11.　　Metal casting processes
12.　　Fundamentals of welding
13.　　Welding processes
14.　　Mechanical assembly
15.　　Rapid prototyping
16.　　Powder metallurgy
17.　　Shaping processes for polymers
18.　　Final Exam
materials:
Textbook: Principles of Modern Manufacturing, M. P. Groover, Wiley, 2011.

Reference:1.　　Materials & Processes in Manufacturing, J. T. Black & R. A. Kohser, Wiley, 2008.
